member.name: T:BindableApplicationBar.NamespaceDoc
member.summary:
The namespace contains wrappers for (),
() and
() as well as the class that allows to easily set these on a class in XAML through the ApplicationBar property.

member.name: T:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar
member.summary: Serves as a bindable control wrapping the native ApplicationBar for use in MVVM applications.
member.remarks: TODO: Find out if bindings can work through ElementName - check for namescope issues. TODO: Find out if current/max number of buttons/menu items can be exposed as bindable properties. TODO: Figure out the best handling of cases when a button or menu item is added beyond the maximum number allowable.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.Attach(Microsoft.Phone.Controls.PhoneApplicationPage)
member.summary: Attaches the BindableApplicationBar to the specified page, creating the ApplicationBar if required and adding the buttons and menu items specified in the Buttons and MenuItems properties.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.Detach(Microsoft.Phone.Controls.PhoneApplicationPage)
member.summary: Detaches from the specified page, removing all the buttons and menu items specified in the Buttons and MenuItems properties.
member.remarks: Note: The code in this method has not been tested and is likely not to work properly, will possibly raise exceptions and leak memory.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.Buttons
member.summary: Gets or sets the Buttons property. This dependency property indicates the list of BindableApplicationBarButton objects that map to ApplicationBarIconButton generated for the ApplicationBar.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.MenuItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the MenuItems property. This dependency property indicates the list of BindableApplicationBarMenuItem objects that map to ApplicationBarMenuItem generated for the ApplicationBar.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.ButtonsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the ButtonsSource property. This dependency property indicates the collection from which to build the button objects, using the DataTemplate.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.ButtonTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the ButtonTemplate property. This dependency property indicates the template for a that is used together with the collection to create the application bar buttons.
member.remarks: The default template defines the property names to match the names of properties of a BindableApplicationBarButton.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.MenuItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the MenuItemsSource property. This dependency property indicates the collection from which to build the MenuItem objects, using the DataTemplate.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.MenuItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the MenuItemTemplate property. This dependency property indicates the template for a that is used together with the collection to create the application bar MenuItems.
member.remarks: The default template defines the property names to match the names of properties of a BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attached ApplicationBar is visible.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.IsMenuEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu is enabled.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.IsMenuVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu is visible.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the BackgroundColor property. This dependency property indicates the BackgroundColor of the ApplicationBar.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the ForegroundColor property. This dependency property indicates the ForegroundColor of the ApplicationBar.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the Mode property. This dependency property indicates the Mode of the ApplicationBar.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar.BindableOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the BindableOpacity property. This dependency property indicates the Opacity of the ApplicationBar. The property can be used instead, since BindableOpacity is only used to allow handling changes to .

member.name: T:BindableApplicationBar.Bindable
member.summary: Provides an attached dependency property that can be used to set a on a object.

member.name: F:BindableApplicationBar.Bindable.ApplicationBarProperty
member.summary: ApplicationBar Attached Dependency Property

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.Bindable.GetApplicationBar(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the ApplicationBar property. This dependency property indicates the BindableApplicationBar instance associated with a page.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.Bindable.SetApplicationBar(System.Windows.DependencyObject,BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBar)
member.summary: Sets the ApplicationBar property. This dependency property indicates the BindableApplicationBar instance associated with a page.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.Bindable.OnApplicationBarChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the ApplicationBar property.
member.param: The on which the property has changed value.
Event data that is issued by any event that tracks changes to the effective value of this property.

member.name: T:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem
member.summary: A wrapper for an object that adds support for data binding.
member.remarks:
To be used in or
The class derives from to support DataContext and bindings.
Note that event is not wrapped since /// the purpose of this class is to bind to view models and use Commands instead.
member.example:
See the below example for usage of the BindableApplicationBar:
<bar:BindableApplicationBar xmlns:bar="clr-namespace:BindableApplicationBar;assembly=BindableApplicationBar" MenuItemsSource="{Binding MenuItems}"> <bar:BindableApplicationBar.MenuItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <bar:BindableApplicationBarMenuItem Command="{Binding Command}" CommandParameter="{Binding CommandParameter}" IsEnabled="{Binding IsEnabled}" Text="{Binding Text}" /> </DataTemplate> </bar:BindableApplicationBar.MenuItemTemplate> <bar:BindableApplicationBar.MenuItems> <bar:BindableApplicationBarMenuItem Text="{Binding MenuItemText}" IsEnabled="{Binding MenuItemIsEnabled}"/> <bar:BindableApplicationBarMenuItem Text="Menu item 2" Command="{Binding TestCommand2}" CommandParameter="{Binding TestCommand2Parameter}" /> </bar:BindableApplicationBar.MenuItems> </bar:BindableApplicationBar>

member.name: F:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.TextProperty
member.summary: Text Dependency Property

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.Attach(Microsoft.Phone.Shell.ApplicationBar,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an associated and attaches it to the specified application bar.
member.param: The application bar to attach to.
The index at which the associated will be inserted.

member.name: M:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.Detach
member.summary: Detaches the associated from the and from this instance.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the Text property. This dependency property indicates the Text bound to the associated ApplicationBarMenuItem's Text property.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the associated menu item is enabled.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the Command property. This dependency property indicates the command to execute when the menuItem gets clicked.

member.name: P:BindableApplicationBar.BindableApplicationBarMenuItem.CommandParameter
member.summary: Gets or sets the CommandParameter property. This dependency property indicates the parameter to be passed to the Command when the menu item gets pressed.
